creator: janan81@gmail.com
text:
After installing the subversion.hpi plugin. While re-starting the tomcat following exception is displayed and not able to view the Hudson login page

Please suggest me if i am missing some thing while re-starting the tomcat

Exception in Logs:

creator: knst.kolinko@gmail.com
text:
Please ask on the users mailing list.
http://tomcat.apache.org/bugreport.html#Bugzilla%20is%20not%20a%20support%20forum
